ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to increase the Governmentâ€™s ability to encourage employer compliance with Temporary Foreign Worker Program and International Mobility Program conditions and deter non-compliance by implementing a range of consequences to enable a proportionate response to varying degrees of non-compliance.
